thread.section_title: Ace Ticket Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ace Ticket | www.aceticket.com | 2 of 197
thread.title: Sageduo

author: Sageduo
title: Sageduo
text: Ace ticket is simple to use, no hassles at all. I just wish the ticket prices and fees were more reasonable. It's always amazing to me that they are advertising tickets at 10:01am that have just gone on sale at 10am. No wonder your average person is shut out of buying tickets at face value. It's an unfair advantage but unfortunately it is the only way to get to attend the activities you want.
